summary: Comprehensive testing of CTA → Intent → Capability onboarding system. All 21 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests verified all CTAs are visible, clickable, and pass correct intent parameters to signup page. Intent display and change functionality working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Intent service properly implements domain-agnostic design with support for COMMERCE, EDUCATION, HEALTHCARE, HOSPITALITY, SERVICES, LOGISTICS, GENERAL domains
All CTAs correctly route to /signup with intent parameter - no direct module activation
Intent capture API stores intent with source tracking (campaignId, referralCode, sourceUrl)
Suggestions API returns advisory-only capability suggestions based on intent
Signup page correctly displays captured intent with 'Change' button for modification
14 intents registered across multiple domains with proper priority ordering

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all CTA navigation and intent display tests passed)

seed_data_creation: Created test intent captures with TEST_ prefix for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: CTA → Intent → Capability onboarding system is fully functional. Key verified features: 1) Marketing page CTAs at /home route to /signup with intent parameters, 2) Feature card CTAs (Start Selling, Go Online, Launch Marketplace) are visible and clickable, 3) Signup page displays captured intent with 'Setting up to [intent]' message, 4) Change button allows user to modify intent selection, 5) Intent definitions API returns all 14 registered intents, 6) Intent capture API stores intent with tracking metadata, 7) Intent suggestions API returns appropriate capability suggestions for each intent.

intent_definitions.intent_structure: PASS - All intents have key, domain, label, description, suggestedCapabilities

intent_suggestions.sell_in_store: PASS - Returns pos, inventory, accounting suggestions
intent_suggestions.sell_online: PASS - Returns svm, inventory, crm suggestions
intent_suggestions.run_marketplace: PASS - Returns mvm, payments_wallets, analytics suggestions

intent_capture.capture_sell_in_store: PASS - Creates intent with COMMERCE domain, MARKETING_PAGE source
intent_capture.invalid_key: PASS - Returns 400 with available intents list

cta_routes.get_routes: PASS - Returns all standard CTA routes with intent parameters

single_definition.get_definition: PASS - Returns single intent with full details

url_parsing.parse_url: PASS - Extracts intent, campaignId, referralCode from URL

build_cta_url.build_url: PASS - Builds URL with intent, campaign, referral parameters

signup_page.change_button: PASS - Allows user to change intent selection
signup_page.intent_selection: PASS - Shows 12 intent options when Change clicked
signup_page.email_input: PASS - Email input field present with data-testid
signup_page.continue_button: PASS - Continue button present with data-testid
